column4: If I have a computer that I installed ubuntu on off of the cd, then I did sudo aptitude install kubuntu-desktop, is my machine running Ubuntu or Kubuntu?
so then am i running buntu?  :)
no I couldn't, it says I am logging into Ubuntu 7.04, so it is still Ubuntu underneath.

but now for the real question, the KDE was only for testing purposes, but when I installed kubuntu-desktop, it changed all of the startup logo and login thing to Kubuntu. I want the Ubuntu one back, can anyone help?
